Food on Lancaster University campus
One of the main advantages of working on a campus such as Lancaster’s is the wide variety of places to buy food and drink either to eat in or take away. The following is a rough guide to what’s available, and it covers independent operators as well as the services provided by the University Hospitality and Catering division. Most venues have reduced opening hours outside term time, though many will be open for busy periods such as Intro Week and Graduation Week.
Please also note that there are a number of fast food takeaway restaurants, pizza, Italian, Chinese and Indians takeaway restaurants in Lancaster that offer free delivery to campus, such as Domino’s Pizza, Starvin Marvin, The SuperChef, Flames, Fired Wok, The Moghuls, Delhicious etc…
North Campus
The Spicy Hut
County South, directly opposite Nuffield Theatre entrance. A classic Indian restaurant, the Lancaster outpost of a well known Manchester curry house. Excellent food at reasonable prices, in very attractive surroundings.
Opening hours: Monday to Friday 4 .00 pm – 11.00 pm, Sunday 1.00pm – 9pm. Special/varying hours outside term time.
County Diner and Takeaway
Located in County South, next to County College JCR. Hot food, sandwiches and baguettes. A favorite breakfasting place.
Opening hours: Monday to Thursday 8.00 am – 5.00 pm, Friday 8.00 am – 4.00 pm term time
Food For Thought
Ground floor of the Institute for Advanced Studies building, North Spine. This café provides coffees made from freshly ground Fair-trade coffee beans, which guarantees a better deal for third world producers. Healthier snacking using Fair-trade and organic products. Freshly filled organic baguettes and plated salads.
Term time opening hours: Monday to Friday 9.00 am till 4.00 pm During and out of term except summer.
Bowland Deli
Situated in Bowland College JCR. Offering the ever popular breakfast buns, hot roast sandwich (carved while you wait) along with a wide selections of filled rolls and jacket potatoes with a choice of filling.
Term time opening hours: Monday to Friday 9.30 am – 4.00 pm. Closed out of term
Global Cafe
Located in the Chaplaincy Centre, Bowland Avenue. Serves toasted sandwiches, baked potatoes, hot meals.
Opening hours: Monday to Friday 8.30 am-4.30pm
The Atrium
Located in the Geography department. Tea/coffee Soup and sandwiches
Monday-Thursday 9.00am-4.00pm, Friday 9.00am-3.30pm
Eating on Lancaster University campus
Alexandra square area
Greggs
Situated east end of Alexandra Square. Takeaway hot pies and rolls, baguettes and sandwiches, cakes and hot drinks. Sometimes queues, but very fast service.
Opening hours: 8.00 am – 7.00pm everyday during term time. Varying hours outside term time.
LUSU Shop
Just off Alexandra Square, next to Slaidburn House. A recent example of student enterprise is the hot soup counter, offering a choice of two fresh-made soups every day to take away. Soups available between 11.00 am and 3.30 pm daily. Not open out of term.
Spar shop
Just off Alexandra Square, further on from Slaidburn House. As well as the usual range of provisions there is a take away counter offering hot and cold food, and hot drinks from machines.
Opening hours: Monday to Friday 8.00 am – 10.00 pm; Saturday 9.00 am – 6.00 pm; Sunday 10.00 am – 2.00 pm open out of term
Diggles
Just off Alexandra Square, next to travel shop. Takeaway hot food and drinks
Opening hours: 8.00 am – 4.00 pm during weekdays in term time.
The Sultan Experience
Located under the Spar next to LUSU
An off-shoot of Lancaster’s famous Sultan of Lancaster restaurant. High quality hot food from many cultures to eat in or take away.
Opening hours: 10.00 am – 4:00 am (really!) all week and out of term time
South Spine
The Venue
Located down the steps leading from Alexandra square. A modern coffee shop that provides high quality coffee and a range of teas and herbal infusions. A broad range of sandwiches, wraps and jacket potatoes with a wide selection of fillings, and high quality cakes are also on offer.
Term time opening hours: 8.00 am – 8.30 pm Monday to Friday, 10.30 am – 6.00 pm on weekends
Vacation opening hours: 8.00 am – 6.00 pm Monday to Friday, 10.30 am – 6.00 pm on weekends
Atkinsons Fish and Chip Shop
Classic fresh fish and chips, a great student favourite.
Opening hours during term time: Monday to Friday 11.30 am – 2.00pm and 4.30 pm – 10.00 pm, Sat/Sun 4.30 pm – 10.00 pm.
Eating on Lancaster University campus
Pizzetta Republic
Part of a national chain. Pizzas, burgers, kebabs, eat in or take away. Also houses Café Republic providing coffees, sandwiches/baguettes with a choice of fillings.
Fylde Sandwich Bar
Situated in Fylde College. Offers toasted teacakes or tasty cheese on toast for a mid morning snack, followed at lunchtime by a wide and varied selection of fresh baked rolls and fillings.
Term time opening hours; Monday to Friday 9.30 am – 4.00 pm during term only
The Hub Café
Situated on the ground floor of the Management School, accessible from the South Spine or South West Drive. The Hub area is a social space for students, staff and visitors, with the Café providing an atmosphere for networking with relaxed surroundings and high quality food and beverages, with emphasis on local produce.
Term time opening hours: 8.30 am – 4.30 pm Monday to Friday.
Vacation opening hours: 8.30 am – 4.30 pm Monday to Friday.
Wong’s Chinese Restaurant
George Fox building. Wide range of Chinese dishes to eat in or take away. Special set lunch offers. Big favourite with Chinese students on campus.
Wibbly Wobbly Burger Bar
High quality burgers, chicken dishes and vegetarian meals, made to order. Makes a point of using locally-produced fresh produce.
Opening hours: 10.00am – 11.00pm daily
LUSU Central Store
Another LUSU-operated enterprise. General store, provisions, sandwiches and food
Opening hours: 8:30pm – 11.00pm Monday-Friday, 9:00am-11:00pm Saturday and Sunday
Café 21
Situated on the top level of the Infolab 21 building, this offers additional seating on the roof terrace with spectacular views. Cooked to order full English breakfast, hot baguette of the day and homemade soup are some of the delights available.
Café 21 is open 8.30 am – 4.00 pm Food is served until 2.00pm Open all year out of term
Barker House Farm
The open food court provides an ideal meeting space where you can grab a coffee or have a more substantial meal. During the day Barkers offers a range of made to order sandwiches, homemade soup and the very popular filled panini. From 4 pm you can dine in the restaurant choosing one, two or three courses from the menu or you have the option to dine in a less formal atmosphere and select a dish from our Bar Snacks Menu. The food court is open from 10am till late Monday to Friday. No out of term opening but this may change in the near future
